zimlet.label: Zimbra RSS/ATOM Zimlet
zimlet.description: Display RSS/ATOM feeds in a mail folder

zimbra-zimlet-rssfeed.title: Subscribe to RSS/ATOM feed
zimbra-zimlet-rssfeed.modalText: Zimbra can display RSS/ATOM feeds in a mail folder. To get started provide a name for the RSS/ATOM feed and the URL to the feed.
zimbra-zimlet-rssfeed.name: Name
zimbra-zimlet-rssfeed.reload: Feed added, reload window to update folder list
zimbra-zimlet-rssfeed.error: Could not load RSS/ATOM feed, check URL
